meanings: (전쟁이 끝남) end[termination] of the war, (formal) cessation of hostilities[the war]

examples.korean: the anniversary of the ending of the Pacific War 발음듣기 태평양 전쟁 종전 기념일 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the anniversary of the ending of the Pacific War 발음

examples.korean: a ceremony to mark the 50th anniversary of the end of the war 발음듣기 종전 50주년을 기념하는 기념식 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a ceremony to mark the 50th anniversary of the end of the war 발음

examples.korean: the President’s passing reference to the end of the war 발음듣기 대통령이 그 전쟁의 종전에 대해 지나가는 말로 언급함 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the President’s passing reference to the end of the war 발음

examples.korean: a cessation of hostilities 발음듣기 전투 종료[종전] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Two presidents signed the end-of-war declaration. 발음듣기 양국 대통령은 종전 선언에 서명했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Two presidents signed the end-of-war declaration. 발음
